outline.title: Mr. DJ Enterprise Design System
outline.summary: Cover slide met titel, subtitel en branding. Professionele introductie van het design system.

outline.title: Design System Overview
outline.summary: Introductie van het design system: doel, scope, en voordelen. Uitleg waarom een design system essentieel is voor consistentie en schaalbaarheid.

outline.title: Brand Foundation
outline.summary: Kleuren, typografie, spacing, en grid systeem. De fundamentele design tokens die de basis vormen.
outline.image_plan: Kleurenpalet visualisatie met Mr. DJ kleuren

outline.title: Typography System
outline.summary: Type scale, font families, weights, line heights. Complete typografische hiÃ«rarchie van H1 tot body text.

outline.title: Color System
outline.summary: Primary, secondary, accent colors. Semantic colors voor success, warning, error. Accessibility compliance.
outline.image_plan: Kleur swatches met HEX codes en gebruik voorbeelden

outline.title: Spacing & Grid System
outline.summary: 8px base unit, spacing scale (4, 8, 16, 24, 32, 48, 64px). 12-column responsive grid.

outline.title: Atoms: Buttons
outline.summary: Button varianten: primary, secondary, outline, ghost. States: default, hover, active, disabled. Sizes: small, medium, large.
outline.image_plan: Button components showcase met alle varianten

outline.title: Atoms: Form Inputs
outline.summary: Text input, textarea, select, checkbox, radio, toggle switch. States en validatie feedback.

outline.title: Atoms: Icons & Badges
outline.summary: Icon library (50+ icons), badge components voor status indicators, tags, en labels.

outline.title: Molecules: Cards
outline.summary: Card varianten: basic, image, pricing, testimonial, event. Hover states en interacties.
outline.image_plan: Card components showcase met verschillende types

outline.title: Molecules: Navigation
outline.summary: Header, navbar, breadcrumbs, pagination, tabs. Mobile responsive navigation patterns.

outline.title: Molecules: Form Groups
outline.summary: Form layouts, field groups, inline validation, error messages, helper text.

outline.title: Organisms: Hero Sections
outline.summary: Hero varianten: full-width, split, video background, carousel. CTAs en overlays.
outline.image_plan: Hero section voorbeelden met verschillende layouts

outline.title: Organisms: Pricing Tables
outline.summary: Pricing card layouts: 2-column, 3-column, comparison table. Popular badges, feature lists.

outline.title: Organisms: Testimonial Sections
outline.summary: Review cards, rating displays, client logos, carousel layouts. Social proof componenten.

outline.title: Organisms: Media Galleries
outline.summary: Image grids, lightbox, video players, before/after sliders. Responsive masonry layouts.

outline.title: Organisms: Contact Sections
outline.summary: Contact forms, info cards, maps integration, social links. Multi-step forms.
outline.image_plan: Contact section met form en info

outline.title: Templates: Homepage
outline.summary: Complete homepage template met hero, services, pricing, testimonials, CTA sections.

outline.title: Templates: Service Pages
outline.summary: Service page layouts voor bruiloften, bedrijfsfeesten, DJ+Sax. Feature grids, proces flows.

outline.title: Templates: Local SEO Pages
outline.summary: City-specific page templates met lokale content, venues, reviews. Programmatic generation ready.

outline.title: Templates: Booking Flow
outline.summary: Multi-step booking process: date selection, package choice, add-ons, contact info, confirmation.

outline.title: Templates: Blog & News
outline.summary: Templates voor de blog overzichtspagina en de individuele artikelpagina.
outline.image_plan: Blog listing en article page mockups

outline.title: Templates: Error Pages
outline.summary: Gestandaardiseerde templates voor de 404 (Not Found) en 500 (Server Error) pagina's.

outline.title: Templates: Booking Flow
outline.summary: Multi-step booking process: date selection, package choice, add-ons, contact info, confirmation.

outline.title: Animations & Transitions
outline.summary: Micro-interactions, page transitions, scroll animations, loading states. Performance optimized.

outline.title: Responsive Patterns
outline.summary: Breakpoints (mobile, tablet, desktop, wide). Responsive component behavior en layout shifts.

outline.title: Accessibility Features
outline.summary: WCAG 2.1 AA compliance, keyboard navigation, screen reader support, focus management, ARIA labels.

outline.title: Performance Optimization
outline.summary: Code splitting, lazy loading, image optimization, Core Web Vitals targets (LCP, FID, CLS).

outline.title: Component Documentation
outline.summary: Storybook integration, prop tables, usage examples, do's and don'ts. Developer guidelines.

outline.title: Design Tokens
outline.summary: JSON/YAML token files voor kleuren, spacing, typography. Multi-platform export (CSS, SCSS, JS).

outline.title: Implementation Guide
outline.summary: Tech stack: React, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion. Component library structure, import patterns.
outline.image_plan: Tech stack logos en code structure

outline.title: Real-World Usage
outline.summary: Live examples van componenten in productie. Voor en na vergelijkingen. Performance metrics.

outline.title: Roadmap & Future
outline.summary: Geplande componenten, versioning strategy, maintenance plan. Community contributions.

outline.title: Next Steps
outline.summary: Implementation timeline, resources, contact info. Call to action voor developers en designers.
